posts.author: Deniedz
posts.content:
Hi guys, I'm going to bother you again: D 
Sorry if this could be a duplicate post, but I tried to search the forum in the epic build category, without success.
I remembered a very famous build, to be played on pvp servers., and maybe someone can help me. 
I don't quite remember what the crossed classes were, I remember that it had at least 38 sorcerer levels. 
The peculiarity was that it was based on Constitution, absorbed a large number of damages and used elemental shields to do harm to your opponents. Does anyone remember it? 
Could you give it to me if I don't ask for much? Thank you. <3

posts.author: Yunim
posts.content:
You're looking for a CON based Sorc38/Pal1/Monk1. I can only find three Sorc38/Pal1/Monk1 builds on the ECB. All three of them are built for PvM rather than PvP, and only one of them is CON focused.

Sorc38/Pal1/Monk1 by cdaulepp. [exalted-sorceress-sorcerer-38-paladin-1 ... 15460.html]
A CHA based sorcerer with Auto Still 3 and ESF: Necromancy, this "Exalted Sorceress" is probably the famous build you are thinking of.

Sorc38/Pal1/Monk1 by Stephen Hawking. [https://world-of-greyhawk.github.io/bui ... 89148.html]
A CHA based sorcerer with Auto Still 3, ESF: Evocation, and ESF: Necromancy, there isn't much of a difference between this build and the one above.

Sorc38/Pal1/Monk1 by Orion2019. [the-celestial-defender-sorcerer-38-pala ... 55371.html]
A CON based sorcerer with EDR3 and Auto Still 3 (or just EDR3), this is the closest build on the ECB to what you want but it needs to be edited for PvP.
